meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Staphylea, bearing bladder-like seed pods.
meanings.sent1: The bladdernuts in the garden have interesting seed pods.
meanings.sent2: I collected some bladdernuts to study their unique seed pods.
meanings.sent3: The bladdernuts whispered to each other about their puffy pods.
meanings.sent4: The bladdernuts in the forest resembled tiny balloons filled with seeds.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the bladdernuts' bladder-like pods.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is considered insignificant or worthless.
meanings.sent1: He was often called a bladdernut by his classmates.
meanings.sent2: The broken toy was tossed aside as a bladdernut.
meanings.sent3: The bladdernut of the group always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a bladdernut among the accomplished artists.
meanings.sent5: The old book was seen as a bladdernut until its hidden value was discovered.
